message.toBegin: To begin the journey, click on my username.
message.explainer: After logging in, you can browse through the folders on my computer. Go to the desktop and click on the projects folder to see all my projects.

modale.fullscreenSecondText: Click on the screen icon below

contact.title: Contact me
contact.name: @:common.name
contact.description: If you'd like to talk about a project, or just have a chat, leave me a message and I'll get back to you as soon as possible!

error.email: is not a valid e-mail address
error.empty: Please fill in all fields before sending your message
error.unknown: The message could not be sent. You can contact me directly at the following email address:

logma.contextFirstPrapgrah: Logma production is a movie production company based in Rennes. Founded by Baptiste Fablet. At the start of this project, there was already a logma production site created by the company director with Wordpress.
logma.contextSecondPrapgrah: The decision was made to rebuild this site from scratch, with a simple, tried-and-tested technical stack, to try and make a website without a Framework and without someoneonce helping to make it fast and efficient.
logma.contextThirdPrapgrah: In order to make the entrepreneur autonomous in the management of this site, it was necessary to develop a backoffice from which he could publish new photos, add projects and links to his videos.
logma.goalFirst: Redesign of website with existing graphic identity
logma.goalThird: Develop a backoffice to manage the site
logma.goalFifth: Improve loading speed and overall performance
